title: China has URF available to play right now

embed.description: 英雄联盟101战争学院，推荐攻略，视频攻略，小仓解说视频

body: Can we stop pretending there is any excuse for Riot to not give us URF when Tencent can in China?

replies.body: > July 18 - July 30 (18: 00-23: 59 open), ***open 24 hours a day throughout the week***

It's open 24 hours on the weekends.
Some of the comments are complaining about the hours and elementary schoolers playing. One guy says he's going to enjoy beating them.
Ye you're right and on the weekdays it opens something like after 6 P.M. their time I believe.
I only care one thing, when URF or ARURF coming home!!!!{{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}}
Yi perma ult, ~~AP heal off turrets Galio~~ RIP, AP Ashe, can't wait
Every time URF goes up people just flood the boards complaining about how stale it is anyways.
I don't understand the downvotes, he isn't incorrect

Probably because if you look at the boards any given day they're always flooded with someone raging about something. "Lee Sin is broken fuck u rito" "YASUO REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE" "OMFG CHO ONE SHOT ME GGEZ" "When are we gonna nerf duskblade" "tanks can 1 shot you and take no damage ok" etc etc etc

So then with that in mind I could also say it seems like the normal game is pretty stale. Better just give up on it and make League of Legends 2 right?
But it doesn't change the fact that it happens, so there was really no reason to downvote him...

Because he's using that as an argument to not have URF and it's a bad argument.

For example what if I went into a thread asking for nerfs for Cho'Gath and said "Every time Cho gets nerfed people just flood the boards complaining about how weak and non meta he is anyways." Implying that Cho shouldn't be nerfed just because some people on the boards will rage. If we went with that logic nothing would ever change with this game and people would have stopped playing it years ago.

You don't realize that he has no argument
He is just stating that people complain about how stale it is
He said nothing about whether or not we should bring URF back

It was implied by the tone of his comment and him commenting in the first place...his comment was
> Every time URF goes up people just flood the boards complaining about how stale it is anyways.

with the implied part being - so why should we even bring it back.

If he wasn't here to argue against URF he wouldn't have said anything or he would have said something different.
Thank you. I'm actually for hire if you want more great ideas. Next suggestion? How about we make a Pirates of the Caribbean 6 - Jack Falls in Love With the Monkey Who Is Also Named Jack. Rated MA.
It's almost like the Boards aren't one entity, but rather a collection of separate people with different opinions....
Lies. We are one mind.
We are a legion. ~~We do not forgive.~~ For we are many.
Different people my man different people. I for one never even go to the boards when URF is up as I'm too busy spamming games.
Maybe because the people who like it aren't complaining about it?
Still better than Ascension every weekend.
URF should be a permanent game mode.

no, but it should be on way more than this, there has to be a middle ground, if what you said it would stop being a gimmick and we wouldnt love it, it never comes out and we hate riot for it, about 2 weekends in a row every 2 or 3 months and its perfect

No I would still love it if it was permanent. I don't require that it be permanent for me to play it though I just want to see it in the not so rotating queue more. Doubt that is ever going to happen though I've given up on Riots decision making.

Edit: gotta love the downvotes from people lmao "Your opinion is wrong you wouldn't love URF if it was permanent now shut up and eat your Poro King" - boards 2k17

Some people are quite aggressive with their downvotes. xD

They just seem to think "disagreeing with you = downvote"
Yep. But whatever it is what it is :P

Personally, I think "1 downvote = 1 silent f##k you", and so I tend not to use them.
Upvote or nothing is the for the most part my preference.

yea i dont like people saying "it gets stale after a short while". i would play it more than aram. when it was out a couple months ago i played like 40 games in 2 days lol. i wish it was permanent as well

Post won't get deleted they just won't respond to it at all just like every other URF thread made the past few weeks. Sucks but for some reason they don't even want to talk about it. My guess is some rioter that got rekt in the mode a bunch and is now too salty to put it back on kappa :^)

"I want more URF!"

*Monkey paw curls one finger.*

#Riot Games NA has been bought out fully by Garena.
Is garena bad? I was under the impression they did more sales and what not.

Is Garena even on the new client yet?

I'm legit asking.  Their store prices are also completely different and I'm not even sure if they have champ price-reduction there.
Their store prices are ridiculous. An ultimate skin there is what we'd pay for a 975 or 1350 or something crazy like that.

Or you do realize that the standards of living at Garena regions are vastly different from what we have, right?

You're not wrong though.
....But..... the servers are open to vastly differenty countries simultaneously.... that probably don't have the same standard of living.
I have no clue. I honestly only know what i hear from others about it.

Garena is, like, really bad. Despite the neat things they give you, Garena has (from what I hear) terrible customer service, moderation in-game that doesn't give a shit and outages all the damn time. [Reddit Reference](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/45dcny/i_think_garena_is_no_longer_an_appropriate_lol/)
Did they get the real Urf or the shitty one not as many like but we all play cause its something
Pretty sure they just got regular URF as the page I saw on it didn't mention anything about random and in the chinese client it shows up as URF iirc
Like, what even is Riot's reason for not having URF for so long? I don't get it.

They don't have one. At least not a reason they've voiced to us. A friend of mine suggested it was probably a sales thing. Hold URF back until they get a good skin line and everyone is hyped for it then release skins etc at the same time as URF so all the people playing buy the fuck out of em.
"But having URF more than 4 days in a span of 365 devalues it and no one will want to play it! No way people will play URF if it's 6 or 8 or maybe even 10 days!"
Exactly

> [{quoted}](name=GIaceon,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8iqKLl1V,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-24T09:38:32.984+0000)
>
> Can we stop pretending there is any excuse for Riot to not give us URF when Tencent can in China?

Riots official response - "We know you guys have been asking for URF quite a bit lately and it's a mode we enjoy too! So here's 4213847129834719823749 weeks of Poro King in a row!! Haha just kidding guys we wouldn't do that to ya. It's Poro King every other week with Ascension GLHF!" kappa
We need to spam ask riot about this.
It didn't mention anything about it being actual urf.  some similarities, but no manaless 80% CDR mentioned.

Playerbase:  "Hey do you think we could have regular URF sometime soon?"

Riot:  "Blah blah blah something something something... But our new client is so new and clienty that it doesn't yet support other game modes, but we here at Riot don't really understand why you guys want URF anyway, especially when the last time you had it was May 2016, that's only 14 months, come on!  Besides let us give you two great reasons why you don't even really need or want URF:  

1)  Legend of the Poro King 

2) Ascension

What else do you really need!"
??? next thing you know they will be getting one for all
Can't wait to see how much time Riot is gonna ignore that kind of thread again

Techent owns riot and gives good shit to the Chinese server. They get voice chat.

Its really out of riots control
